contents.item: It is naive to think that sport is above politics, that any kind of level playing field exists, or that sport allows the world to put its problems on hold.
Football combines the two worst features of American life. It is violence punctuated by committee meetings.
Great sport begins at a point where it has ceased to be healthy.
Skate to where the puck is going and not to where it's been.
I hate all sports as rabidly as a person who likes sports hates common sense.
You can't think and hit at the same time.
Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners  only survivors.
Horses and jockeys mature earlier than people - which is why horses are admitted to race tracks at the age of two  and jockeys before they are old enough to shave.
Jogging is very beneficial. It's good for your legs and your feet. It's also very good for the ground. It makes it feel needed.
It you watch a game  it's fun. If you play it  it's recreation. If you work at it  it's golf.
Winning can be defined as the science of being totally prepared.
Running for money doesn't make you run fast. It makes you run first.
Let's win this one for the Gipper.

Sports allow men to build up situations of emergency. What he then demands of himself is unnecessary achievement - and unnecessary sacrifice. He artificially creates the tension that he has been spared by affluent society.
